article.title: A Mote in Andromeda's Disk: a Misidentified Periodic AGN Behind M31

multiple_choice_question.text: Figure 1 shows a zoomed-in image of J0045+41. What does the inset image show?
choices: The location of J0045+41 in the Milky Way galaxy.
The relative size of J0045+41 compared to the Sun.
The area surrounding J0045+41 on the northeast of M31.
A simulation of the gravitational waves emitted by J0045+41.

multiple_choice_question.text: In Figure 2, what model is fitted to the X-ray spectrum of CXO J004527.3+413255?
Figure 6 presents the decomposed spectrum of J0045+41. What type of galaxy does the derived host galaxy spectrum resemble?

The authors use the Supersmoother algorithm to analyze the lightcurve data as shown in Figure 8. What type of signal\'s power spectrum does a damped random walk process describe, as mentioned in Formula (6)?
choices: X-ray emissions from a black hole

multiple_choice_question.text: Table 2 summarizes the orbital and gravitational properties of possible orbital periods for J0045+41.  What is the range of the calculated inspiral time (tGW) for the different orbital periods considered?
